report_title: KJET Kisii County Application Ranking and Evaluation

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Active B2B/B2C sales; multi-channel, defensible quality (Score 5).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear problem/solution; quantified targets; detailed plan; co-investment readiness (Score 5).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy); fills critical aggregation/cooling node (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: High women/youth participation (45% W, 55% Y); 2+ green practices (Solar, aflatoxin control) (Score 5).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Cooperative registered >3 yrs; clear governance structure (Score 5).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover 5–<10M (KES 7M in 2024); stable trend; simple verifiable records (Score 4).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent orders (implied by stable revenue from members' produce) (Score 4).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Strong plan; quantified targets (increase cooling); budget is rough (Score 4).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy); fills critical aggregation/cooling node (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: 55% women participation, PWD inclusion; 2+ green practices (Solar, rainwater harvest, agroforestry) (Score 5).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: MSME Association, registration appears new/unclear based on KJET application number (Score 3).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover 1–<5M (KES 2.5M in 2024); stable trend; M-Pesa statement provided (Score 3).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent orders; growing channels (B2C, local shops); basic quality assurance (Score 4).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Additional VC (Leather); fills critical manufacturing/value addition node (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: 55% women members; some intent on sustainability (local sourcing) (Score 3).
